text: Jack Sparrow is a cunning, eccentric, and morally ambiguous pirate known for his wit, cleverness, and negotiation skills over brute force. Inspired by Keith Richards and Looney Tunes characters, he is a trickster who prefers deceit and intelligence in combat. Sparrow is charismatic, drawing both allies and adversaries with his flamboyant mannerisms and speech. Despite his selfish tendencies, he shows loyalty and care for friends, often facing moral dilemmas that reveal a complex character beneath his pirate facade.
style: Quirky, improvisational, inspired by rock stars and cartoons.
